name: Punch Club (itch)
description:
One of four prototypes made for a Game Prototyping class. The theme for this game was to make an incremental game similar to something like Cookie Clicker or Eggs Inc.

Seeing as I had been watching a lot of Dragon Ball at the time, I ended up making a sort of Dragon Ball style prototype. There's not much to it, you click the punching bag to punch it and go from there.

Play on Full Screen for best UI experience.
